name: Plane Walker
description:
Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • Z - toggle interaction with environment
  • X - join / leave current plane

Goal:

Connect the 4 quarters of the ellipse

Walkthrough (spoiler!):

If you're totally stuck, here's a video walkthrough:

Technical Details:

Made in TypeScript using Phaser 3

Known bug:

It's possible to walk through some of the trees, please consider them blocking and don't abuse this to solve the game... It's an easy fix but against the jam rules to upload another version during voting.
